content:
CompSci 260P Homework Assignments

The homework problems extend and complement the material presented in the lectures and in the text

PROTOCOLS

  • Homework is to be turned in to the class dropbox before 11:00am on the due date
    instructions for using EEE dropbox can be found at https://eee.uci.edu/help/dropbox/students/
  • No late submissions will be accepted
  • Some solutions will be discussed in class
  • I may call on one of the students who has solved a problem to present the solution to the class
Last modified: Jun 11, 2018
